sys_script_include.name: OMDBposter

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_11453198939382100d6eb4897bba1020
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_908210_raposa_0.OMDBposter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>OMDBposter</name><script><![CDATA[var OMDBPosterService = Class.create();
OMDBPosterService.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    
    getPosterUrl: function(movieTitle) {
        var apiKey = '6af5cc6d'; // Substitua pela sua chave de API
        var url = 'https://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=' + apiKey + '&t=' + encodeURIComponent(movieTitle);
        
        try {
            var request = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
            request.setHttpMethod('GET');
            request.setEndpoint(url);
            
            var response = request.execute();
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            var parsedResponse = JSON.parse(responseBody);
            
            if (parsedResponse && parsedResponse.Poster) {
                return parsedResponse.Poster;
            } else {
                return '';
            }
        } catch (ex) {
            gs.error('Erro ao buscar o poster do filme: ' + ex.message);
            return '';
        }
    },
    
    type: 'OMDBPosterService'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-07-05 21:02:52</sys_created_on><sys_id>11453198939382100d6eb4897bba1020</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>OMDBposter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Raposa Carrossel" source="x_908210_raposa_0">b96e80b5930302100d6eb4897bba1042</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Carrossel">b96e80b5930302100d6eb4897bba1042</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_11453198939382100d6eb4897bba1020</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-10 14:50:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
